title: Parallel bars
creator_credit: Associated Film Services and Jan Sadlo
brief_description: Demonstrates proper adjustments of the parallel bars, how to mount, and such elementary stunts as support positions, basic swinging movement, straddel seat travels, upper armstands, and tolls, from and rear swing rises, simple turns, and dismounts. Includes slow motion close-ups and performance of stunts of intermediate difficulty.
